author: Simon Difford
description: Inspired and created for Monkey 47 Experimentum 2y06. Honey and mint notes in the gin are amplified in this bijou sour with monastic herbal liqueur complexity.
name: Minty Mellow Yellow
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
